fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Features
fields.description: Collection of features to be placed one by one. No guarantee of order. All features use the same input position.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Features
fields.description: List of features to be placed in sequence. The output position of the previous feature is used as the input position to the next.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Bounding Box Min
fields.description: Dimensions of the Bounding Box

fields.title: Bounding Box Max
fields.description: Dimensions of the Bounding Box

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Width Modifier
fields.description: How many blocks to increase the cave radius by, from the center point of the cave.

fields.title: Skip Carve Chance
fields.description: The chance to skip doing the carve (1 / value).

fields.title: Height Limit
fields.description: The height limit where we attempt to carve.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Condition
fields.description: Condition for placing associated Feature

alternates.title: Conditional Features
alternates.description: Array of Features, and their associated Conditions, for attempted placement. These features will be evaluated as ordered.

fields.title: Early Out Scheme"<"condition Success", "placement Success"
fields.description: Denote whether placement should end on first successful placement or first passed condition.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Min Outer Wall Distance
fields.description: The minimum distance each distribution point must be from the outer wall. [0,10]

fields.title: Max Outer Wall Distance
fields.description: The maximum distance each distribution point can be from the outer wall. [0,20]

fields.title: Min Distribution Points
fields.description: The minimum number of points inside the distance field that can get generated. The distance field is the area consisting of all points with a minimum distance to all destribution points. [0,10]

fields.title: Max Distribution Points
fields.description: The maximum number of points inside the distance field that can get generated. The distance field is the area consisting of all points with a minimum distance to all destribution points. [0,20]

fields.title: Min Point Offset
fields.description: The lowest possible value of random offset applied to the position of each distribution point. [0,10]

fields.title: Max Point Offset
fields.description: The highest possible value of random offset applied to the position of each distribution point. [0,10]

fields.title: Max Radius
fields.description: The maximum possible radius of the geode generated.

fields.title: Crack Point Offset
fields.description: An offset applied to each distribution point that forms the geode crack opening. [0,10]

fields.title: Placements Require Layer0 Alternate
fields.description: If true, the potential placement block will only be placed on the alternate layer0 blocks that get placed. Potential placement blocks are blocks that depend on the existance of another block to be placed. The latter are the layer0 alternate blocks.

fields.title: Invalid Blocks Threshold
fields.description: The threshold of invalid blocks for a geode to have a distribution point in before it aborts generation entirely.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Growth Direction
fields.description: Direction that the plant grows towards. Valid values: UP and DOWN

fields.title: Allow Water
fields.description: Plant blocks can be placed in water.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Width Modifier
fields.description: How many blocks to increase the cave radius by, from the center point of the cave.

fields.title: Skip Carve Chance
fields.description: The chance to skip doing the carve (1 / value).

fields.title: Height Limit
fields.description: The height limit where we attempt to carve.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Search Range
fields.description: How far, in blocks, this feature can search for a valid position to place.

fields.title: Can Place On Floor
fields.description: Can this feature be placed on the ground (top face of a block)?

fields.title: Can Place On Ceiling
fields.description: Can this feature be placed on the ceiling (bottom face of a block)?

fields.title: Can Place On Wall
fields.description: Can this feature be placed on the wall (side faces of a block)?

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Count
fields.description: The number of blocks to be placed.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Placement Radius Around Floor
fields.description: Defines the cubic radius of the blob. [1, 8]

fields.title: Exposed Face
fields.description: Defines a block face that is allowed to be exposed to air and/or water. Other faces need to be embedded for blocks to be placed by this feature. Defaults to upwards face.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Area Dimensions
fields.description: Dimensions (size) of the associated Feature.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Project Input To Floor
fields.description: If true, snaps the y-value of the scattered position to the terrain heightmap. If false or unset, y-value is unmodified.

fields.title: Distribution
fields.description: Parameters controlling the scatter of the feature. Object of type ScatterParams

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Search Volume
fields.description: Axis-aligned bounding box that will be searched for valid placement positions. Expressed as offsets from the input position.

fields.title: Min
fields.description: Minimum extent of the bounding volume expressed as [ x, y, z ]
x_min
y_min
z_min

fields.title: Max
fields.description: Maxium extent of the bounding volume expressed as [ x, y, z ]

fields.title: Search Axis"<"-x", "+x", "-y", "+y", "-z", "+z"
fields.description: Axis that the search will sweep along through the 'search_volume'

fields.title: Required Successes
fields.description: Number of valid positions the search must find in order to place the referenced feature

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Block
fields.description: Reference to the block to be placed.

alternates.title: Places Block
alternates.description: Reference to the block to be placed.

fields.title: Enforce Placement Rules
fields.description: If true, enforce the block's canPlace check.

fields.title: Enforce Survivability Rules
fields.description: If true, enforce the block's canSurvive check.

fields.title: Randomize Rotation
fields.description: If true, randomizes the block's cardinal orientation.

fields.title: May Attach To
fields.description: Allowlist which specifies where the block can be placed.

fields.title: Min Sides Must Attach
fields.description: Number of side faces that need to pass the attach conditions before the block can be placed. Default value is four.

fields.title: Auto Rotate
fields.description: Automatically rotate the block to attach sensibly. This setting is ignored if 'randomize_rotation' is enabled.

fields.title: May Not Attach To
fields.description: Denylist which specifies where the block can't be placed.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Vertical Search Range
fields.description: Range to search for a floor or ceiling for snaping the feature.

fields.title: Surface
fields.description: Defines the surface that the y-value of the placement position will be snapped to. Valid values: 'ceiling', 'floor' and 'random_horizontal'

fields.title: Allow Air Placement
fields.description: Determines whether the feature can snap through air blocks. Defaults to true.

fields.title: Allow Underwater Placement
fields.description: Determines whether the feature can snap through water blocks. Defaults to false.

fields.title: Allowed Surface Blocks
fields.description: A list of blocks that the feature is permitted to snap to. Leaving this empty results in the feature snapping to blocks that can provide support for the given face (up/down/horizontal)

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Adjustment Radius
fields.description: How far the structure is allowed to move when searching for a valid placement position. Search is radial, stopping when the nearest valid position is found. Defaults to 0 if omitted.

fields.title: Facing Direction"<"north", "south", "east", "west", "random"
fields.description: Direction the structure will face when placed in the world. Defaults to "random" if omitted.

fields.title: Constraints
fields.description: Specific constraints that must be satisfied when placing this structure.

fields.title: Grounded
fields.description: When specified, ensures the structure is on the ground.

fields.title: Unburied
fields.description: When specified, ensures the structure has air above it.

fields.title: Block Intersection
fields.description: When specified, ensures the structure only intersects with allowlisted blocks.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Minimum Distance Below Surface
fields.description: The minimum number of blocks required to be between the estimated surface level and a valid place for this feature. Defaults to zero.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Width Modifier
fields.description: How many blocks to increase the cave radius by, from the center point of the cave.

fields.title: Skip Carve Chance
fields.description: The chance to skip doing the carve (1 / value).

fields.title: Height Limit
fields.description: The height limit where we attempt to carve.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Base Cluster
fields.description: Clusters of blocks randomly replaced with "base_block" around the base of the tree.

fields.title: Num Clusters
fields.description: Number of clusters to generate.

fields.title: Cluster Radius
fields.description: The radius of each cluster.

fields.title: Trunk Width
fields.description: The width of the tree trunk.

fields.title: Trunk Height
fields.description: Configuration object for the trunk height.

fields.title: Base
fields.description: Min height for the trunk.

fields.title: Min Height For Canopy
fields.description: Min height where the canopy can be placed.

fields.title: Trunk Lean
fields.description: Configuration object for diagonal branches.

fields.title: Allow Diagonal Growth
fields.description: If true, diagonal branches will be created.

fields.title: Branches
fields.description: Configuration object for branches.

fields.title: Branch Canopy
fields.description: Configuration object for the canopy.

fields.title: Canopy Size
fields.description: The size of the canopy.

fields.title: Simplify Canopy
fields.description: If true the canopy uses a simple pattern.

fields.title: Canopy Offset
fields.description: Canopy position offset relative to the block above the trunk.

fields.title: Min
fields.description: Min canopy position offset.

fields.title: Max
fields.description: Max canopy position offset.

fields.title: Min Width
fields.description: Min width for the canopy.

fields.title: Canopy Slope
fields.description: Configuration object for the canopy slope.

fields.title: Rise
fields.description: The numerator for the slope fraction.

fields.title: Run
fields.description: The denominator for the slope fraction.

fields.title: Canopy Decoration
fields.description: Configuration object for the canopy decoration.

fields.title: Num Steps
fields.description: Number of decoration blocks to place.

fields.title: Step Direction"<"down", "up", "out", "away"
fields.description: Directions to spread decoration blocks.

fields.title: Trunk Width
fields.description: The width of the tree trunk.

fields.title: Height
fields.description: Number of layers for the canopy.

fields.title: Radius
fields.description: The radius of the canopy.

fields.title: Leaf Placement Attempts
fields.description: Max number of attempts to create leaf blocks.

fields.description: Configuration object for the canopy decoration.

fields.description: Number of decoration blocks to place.

fields.description: Max width that the roots can occupy. The width increases up to the max width while moving downwards. When a max width is reached, roots will grow vertically.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Surface
fields.description: Determines if a vegetation patch will grow from the ceiling or the floor.

fields.title: Vertical Range
fields.description: Vertical range used to determine a suitable surface position for the patch.

fields.title: Waterlogged
fields.description: If true, waterlogs the positions occupied by the ground blocks.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.
